channel.title: Some HTML stuff?
channel.description:
Okay, I see people with signatures, now I want one, so I can give people some status on my server.
Really all I want is the color changing thing.
Not really anything. But anything would help?(:
-Diluted

item.title: Some HTML stuff?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:3, topic:285985”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=378242.msg2846040#msg2846040 date=1246289459]
It is not HTML, its BB Code

If you want to change the colour you type

Your Text

Most of the basic colours are covered so you can just replace YOURCOLOR to something like red; blue etc

black red yellow pink green blue maroon
[/quote]

Is there Magenta :D[/quote]
there’s manigger?
[center] No, I don’t think so, I must’ve missed that one.

Lets try not spamming next time.[/center]

Read full topic
